values:
BLACK LIST is playing a show at CHAIN REACTION in anaheim. tickets are $8 (well worth it) please call 714-865-5902 for tickets. 

who: BLACK LIST
what: show
when: Sept. 20
where: Chain Reaction
why: to deliver a full on punk rock assault.

whats up kids. well BLACK LIST hasnt been practicing as much as we should be. Here are my thoughts - Substance abuse can ruin bands. its ok to smoke some pot or drink some beer, but when white drugs get involved things start to get sketchy. im doing my best to keep that shit away from BLACK LIST but people are gonna do what people are gonna do.

anyway this past week has been cool. i got in a fight the other night but didnt realize it until the next morning when i woke up and my knuckles were all raw and bloody. i stubbed my toe on my way to the computer this morning and to tell you the truth im not too happy about it. people need to start commenting on this thing. last night we went to the galaxy to see loogie, the stiches, the avengers, and the crowd. we got in for free and got to hang out backstage which is highly overrated just like X-tina.

Well kids BLACK LIST went into the studio yesterday. The recording process went very smoothly but due to time constraints we only had time to record one song, No Way Out, which took about 4 hours. but we are going back into the studio tuesday to finish up and mix the long awaited BLACK LIST E.P.

Its been a while since the BLACK LIST livejournal has been updated. Due to Alex's inability to not be a flaky bitch, the BLACK LIST E.P. is being recorded tomorrow. (Sorry those of you who have been waiting for a long time. tomorrow it will be here)BLACK LIST would like to thank Tubby Hippo Records for the studio time.

Well yesterday we went to the Galaxy to see D.R.I. and The Scabs. We got there a little early to hang out and drink some beers before the show. Then this fat fucking slob rent a cop kicked us out cause we're not allowed to drink there or something. So we drove to another parking lot and drank the beers then we snuck back in. After the Scabs set was over we had about 15 minutes of time to kill so we thought we might as well smoke a joint outside. Right as the joint was being finished another security dude kicked us out for smoking. This time we did not get back in. This made BLACK LIST very angry so we went around the back and started a fire. (nothing too big just enough to get the point across)

whats up. yesterday was cool. this chicks parents left town for a week so black list decided to go. everything was going good until i started to feel sick then i puked in her backyard all over my shoes. then the dog started to lick up the puke, which made me want to puke some more. i felt a lot better after i puked and the rest of the night was good.


the BLACK LIST live journal has just made its first livejournal friend- thanks julia

If anyone has any parties, birthday parties, barmitzfa?s, gatherings, anything, BLACK LIST WILL PLAY FREE OF CHARGE.

FUCK EMO - BLACK LIST

its the latest fad taking over the land
but i dont think its so cool
fuck your little emo band
i'd like to drown you in a pool

emo pussys make me sick i wish it would just die
because of my views im labeled a dick but i cannot live a lie - FUCK EMO

You people are so happy being sad
it makes no sense to me
emo is just another fad
it will go away soon you'll see

practice went pretty well today. juan is a fucking cunt. tomorrow we finally record the long awaited BLACK LIST E.P. BLACK LIST may be playing a backyard party it is in the final details are still being negotiated.will post when more info comes.
BLACK LIST is going into the studio next week to record their first E.P. called the BLACK LIST e.P. There is only going to be 3 tracks: Fuck Emo, No Way Out and Police Song.

BLACK LIST IS A BAND FORMED IN DECEMBER O3. WE DONT LIKE EMO AND WE PROBABLY DONT LIKE YOU.

RYAN KRONEBUSCH - GUITAR 
DENNIS SHOEMAKER - DRUMS
ALEX MOORE - VOCALS
JEREMY OWENS - BASS


WHATS UP GUYS. PLEASE ACCEPT BLACK LIST INTO THE LIVE JOURNAL COMMUNITY.
